issue.title: Reload search page on load
issue.body:
**Original author :** Portier Thomas

When admin config a catalog to launch a search by default, the page is loaded once and reloaded to lauchn the search. It should do the search at the first load.

comments.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

According to what I see in 4.3.2 (pre-release version), this behaviour does not happen anymore.

Can you confirm Thomas ?
